item.title: 哈佛大学冻结、资金削减令生物技术公司首席财务官头疼不已
item.description:
高管们担心他们将更难筹集到资金。此外，必和必拓首席财务官万迪塔-潘特（Vandita Pant）谈及资本支出、并购和债务目标。【原文：

Executives fear they will have a harder time raising capital. Plus, BHP CFO Vandita Pant talks about capex, M&A and debt targets.

item.title: 中美贸易谈判后，市场将判断言辞是否足够
item.description: 中美贸易谈判结束后，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的顾问宣布谈判取得了 "实质性进展"，但并未提供太多细节。【原文：Financial markets will reopen needing to decide if warm words are as good as action after trade talks between the US and China ended with President Donald Trump’s advisers declaring “substantial progress” had been made, yet without providing many details.】

item.title: 美国大使称加拿大关税可能不会 "完全取消
item.description: 美国驻加拿大大使彼得-胡克斯特拉（Peter Hoekstra）说，即使两国关系有所改善，美国对加拿大进口商品征收的部分关税可能会继续存在。【原文：Some US tariffs on Canadian imports may remain in place even as the relationship between the two countries improves, Peter Hoekstra, the US ambassador to Canada, said.】

item.title: 鲍威尔的强硬言论削弱了债券交易员对降息的乐观情绪
item.description: 债券投资者正在接受杰罗姆-鲍威尔的信息，即美联储不会急于开始降息。【原文：Bond investors are coming to terms with Jerome Powell’s message that the Federal Reserve is in no-rush to start cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 特朗普对廉价石油的渴求激怒了他乐于赞美的行业
item.description: Terrel Hardin 在俄克拉荷马州西部 66 号公路沿线的一家餐馆用餐时，他的电话响了，是坏消息：他的一台石油钻机的发动机坏了。在过去，只需 6,000 美元就能直接修好，但唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战破坏了供应链，他甚至不确定能否买到这个零件。【原文：Terrel Hardin was at a diner along Route 66 in western Oklahoma when his phone rang with bad news: The engine on one of his oil rigs had broken. In times past it would be a straightforward $6,000 fix, but President Donald Trump’s trade war has upended supply chains, and he wasn’t sure the part would even be available.】

item.title: 美中日内瓦会谈取得 "实质性进展
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）和美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）周日表示，中美两国在瑞士举行了为期两天的旨在缓和贸易战的会谈，并取得了 "实质性进展"。【原文：The US and China made “substantial progress” after two days of talks in Switzerland aimed at de-escalating a trade war, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said Sunday.】

item.title: 据称西班牙支持萨瓦德尔并购案作为 BBVA 交易的替代方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙政府愿意考虑萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）与另一家本地银行合作，以应对 BBVA SA 主动提出的竞购。【原文：The Spanish government is open to considering a tie-up for Banco Sabadell SA with another local bank as a way to counter an unsolicited bid from BBVA SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 与微软就重启高风险合作关系进行谈判：金融时报
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周日报道，OpenAI 和微软公司正在修订合作条款，这将使 ChatGPT 制造商能够在未来上市，同时保留软件巨头对人工智能技术的使用权。【原文：OpenAI and Microsoft Corp. are revising the terms of their partnership that will enable the ChatGPT maker to go public at a future date while preserving the software giant’s access to artificial intelligence technology, the Financial Times reported Sunday.】

item.title: 交易员关注长期期权，以对冲关税冲击后的涨势
item.description: 随着四月的波动风暴逐渐消失在人们的记忆中，交易员们只能在较为平静的市场和新一轮标题冲击的无时不在的风险之间寻求平衡。【原文：As April’s volatility storm fades into memory, traders are left balancing calmer markets and the ever-present risk of a fresh round of headline shocks.】

item.title: 苹果公司 2027 年的产品闪电战来得太快了
item.description: 苹果公司计划在 2027 年推出具有纪念意义的新设备，但目前缺乏突破性的设计可能会让人觉得等待是漫长的。另外：苹果公司正在开发 iOS 19 功能，该功能可在不同设备间同步酒店 Wi-Fi 接入详情。【原文：Apple is planning a monumental year for new devices in 2027, but its current lack of breakthrough designs could make that wait feel interminable. Also: The company is working on an iOS 19 feature that syncs hotel Wi-Fi access details across devices, and it’s preparing for an era after Google search.】

item.title: 投资者寻求新兴货币的廉价投资 亚洲零投资
item.description: 多年来，亚洲货币一直屈居于流行的拉丁美洲套利交易之后，随着交易者试图利用美元溢价地位的下降，亚洲货币的廉价性正成为一种资产。【原文：After years of coming second to popular Latin American carry trades, Asian currencies are finding their cheapness has become an asset as traders seek to capitalize on the dollar’s eroding premium status.】

item.title: 教皇利奥呼应方济各，呼吁在乌克兰和加沙实现和平
item.description: 教皇利奥十四世在其首个主日发表讲话，呼吁在乌克兰和加沙实现和平，这是在其前任教皇方济各所传达信息的基础上进行的，同时也让人们看到了其教皇任期内可能出现的地缘政治。【原文：Pope Leo XIV used his first Sunday address to call for peace in Ukraine and Gaza, building on the message of his predecessor, Pope Francis, and offering a glimpse into the likely geopolitics of his papacy.】

item.title: 美国与伊朗在关键问题的不确定性中重启核会谈
item.description: 美国和伊朗官员周日在阿曼开始了第四轮谈判，旨在就德黑兰的核计划达成一项新协议。【原文：US and Iranian officials began a fourth round of negotiations in Oman on Sunday, aiming to reach a new agreement on Tehran’s nuclear program.】

item.title: Shein 停滞不前后，伦敦银行家在市场上四处寻找 IPO 重启机会
item.description: 在备受瞩目的申银万国上市计划暂停之后，伦敦的银行家和投资者正把希望寄托在少数几家候选公司身上，希望它们能够启动首次公开募股活动。【原文：London bankers and investors are pinning their hopes on a handful of candidates to get initial public offering activity off the ground after the much-anticipated listing of Shein hit a pause.】

item.title: CATL 禁止部分美国基金参与 2025 年全球最大规模的上市活动
item.description: 当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商安培瑞斯科技有限公司正计划限制可参与其香港上市的美国投资者类型，这表明中美紧张关系可能正蔓延到首次公开募股市场。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s largest maker of batteries for electric vehicles, is planning to limit the types of US investors that can participate in its Hong Kong listing, an indication that US-China tensions may be spilling into the IPO market.】

item.title: 印度和巴基斯坦股票牛市有望在停战后反弹
item.description: 印度和巴基斯坦这两个拥有核武器的邻国周六意外达成停火协议后，两国股市将出现缓解性反弹，投资者的关注焦点将重新回到经济前景的改善上。【原文：Stocks in India and Pakistan are set for a relief rally following a surprise ceasefire agreement between the two nuclear-armed neighbors on Saturday, as investor focus shifts back to improving economic outlook.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司利润下降，石油疲软预示压力增大
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）报告第一季度利润下降，原因是原油价格下跌给这个世界上最大的石油出口国的财政带来了压力。【原文：Saudi Aramco reported a decline in profit in the first quarter as lower crude prices put pressure on the finances of the world’s biggest oil exporter.】

item.title: 沙特医院运营商 SMC 将在首次公开募股中筹资最多 5 亿美元
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯医院运营商专业医疗公司（Specialized Medical Co.【原文：Saudi Arabian hospital operator Specialized Medical Co. is seeking to raise as much as $500 million in an initial public offering in Riyadh, as listings across the Persian Gulf regain momentum despite volatile markets.】

item.title: 特朗普的盟友阿尔巴尼亚总理寻求将阿尔巴尼亚纳入欧洲：看点
item.description: 埃迪-拉马寻求赢得史无前例的第四个总理任期，承诺最终将阿尔巴尼亚带入欧盟，并在特朗普家族的帮助下将其打造成热门旅游胜地。【原文：Edi Rama seeks to win an unprecedented fourth term as prime minister, pledging to finally take Albania into the European Union and turn it into a hot tourist destination with some help from the Trump family.】

item.title: 特朗普在与中国官员的会晤中表示 "已达成许多共识
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普说，美国和中国的谈判代表在瑞士举行了 "非常好的会议"，努力缓和双方的贸易战。【原文：President Donald Trump said US and Chinese negotiators in Switzerland had “a very good meeting” in an effort to de-escalate their trade war.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁迫在眉睫，美国通胀开始蠢蠢欲动
item.description: 美国消费者价格在经历了九个月来的最小涨幅后，4 月份可能有所回升，这预示着随着许多公司寻求转嫁更高的关税，美国消费者价格将在更大范围内加速上涨。【原文：US consumer prices probably picked up in April after the smallest advance in nine months, foreshadowing a broader acceleration as many companies seek to pass on higher tariffs.】

item.title: 华尔街在私有化交易中玩长线游戏
item.description: KKR & Co.的债务出售表明，华尔街为了防止杠杆承销业务在动荡时期后滑向私人信贷，愿意付出多大的代价。【原文：A KKR & Co. debt sale shows how far Wall Street is willing to go to keep leveraged underwriting business from slipping away to private credit after periods of turmoil.】

item.title: 帕克-康拉德（Parker Conrad）的涟漪财富（Rippling Fortune）获得 20 亿美元新融资
item.description: 据彭博亿万富豪指数（Bloomberg Billionaires Index）显示，人力资源和薪资管理初创公司 Rippling 以 168 亿美元的估值融资 4.5 亿美元。【原文：Rippling, a human resources and payroll startup, has raised $450 million at a valuation of $16.8 billion — a deal that brings the value of the stake of its leader, Parker Conrad, to about $2.3 billion, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长武契奇预计年底通胀率将降至 2% 目标值
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，到 2025 年底，欧洲中央银行的消费价格增长率将达到 2% 的目标。【原文：Consumer-price growth will hit the European Central Bank’s 2% target by the end of 2025, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 巴西法院解除对巴西商业银行收购 Banco Master 的禁令
item.description: 巴西一名法官撤销了一项法院裁决，该裁决阻止了 Banco Master SA 出售给 BRB SA 的计划，因为据称两家银行未能遵守收购的法律要求。【原文：A Brazilian judge revoked a court decision that blocked the planned sale of Banco Master SA to BRB SA because of an alleged failure by the banks to comply with legal requirements for an acquisition.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 失去 Glass Lewis 对三名董事的支持
item.description: 在美国炼油企业与激进投资者之间的代理权争夺战中，代理权咨询公司 Glass Lewis 表示，菲利普斯 66 的股东应投票支持 Elliott Investment Management 提名的三名董事会成员。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Glass Lewis said shareholders of Phillips 66 should vote for three board nominees put forward by Elliott Investment Management, amid a proxy battle between the US oil refiner and activist investor.】

item.title: 加拿大电信公司将移动用户增长放缓归咎于移民政策
item.description: 多年来，加拿大的顶级电信运营商乘着移民潮的东风，每个季度集体新增数十万移动电话用户。这种日子已经一去不复返了。【原文：For years, Canada’s top telecom providers rode a wave of high immigration, collectively adding hundreds of thousands of new mobile phone subscribers most quarters. Those days are over.】

item.title: 在货币政策和贸易中，一切都是 "算术问题
item.description: 欢迎收看《华尔街一周》时事通讯，我们将为您带来资本主义的故事，关于您需要知道的事情，但更多的是您需要思考的事情。我是大卫-威斯汀（David Westin），本周前财政部长拉里-萨默斯（Larry Summers）为我们带来了美联储面对不确定性采取行动的故事，爱尔兰前总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）解释了他的国家是如何吸引所有这些美国制药公司的。如果您还不是订阅者，请在此注册订阅本新闻通讯。【原文：Welcome to the Wall Street Week newsletter, bringing you stories of capitalism about things you need to know, but even more things you need to think about. item.title: 对于疲惫不堪的股市专业人士来说，选择是买入还是待在家里
item.description: 过去一个月股市的惊人反弹，主要是由于主街投资者见风买跌，而专业基金经理则因对经济增长放缓和贸易战干扰的担忧加剧而抛弃美股。【原文：The stock market’s stunning rebound over the last month has largely been driven by Main Street investors buying the dip in everything in sight while professional money managers ditched US stocks, spooked by mounting fears of slowing economic growth and trade war disruptions.】

item.title: 埃尔顿-约翰、Dua Lipa 敦促英国重新考虑人工智能版权计划
item.description: 包括保罗-麦卡特尼（Paul McCartney）、埃尔顿-约翰（Elton John）和杜阿-利帕（Dua Lipa）在内的英国顶级艺术家敦促首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在下周就人工智能规则进行关键投票之前加强版权保护。【原文：Top UK artists, including Paul McCartney, Elton John and Dua Lipa, urged Prime Minister Keir Starmer to strengthen copyright protections ahead of a critical vote on rules governing artificial intelligence next week.】
